pages.text: Thermal adds storage blocks for all of its $(l:thermal:world/ores)ores$(/l) and $(l:thermal:materials/alloys)alloys$(/l), as well as gunpowder, slag, rich slag, and charcoal. With storage blocks from other mods, Thermal follows a convention where the center item in the crafting recipe determines which mod's storage block to craft. For example, surrounding a Thermal copper ingot with 8 Immersive Engineering copper ingots will craft a Thermal copper block.

Thermal adds storage blocks for all of its $(l:thermal:world/ores)ores$(/l) and $(l:thermal:materials/alloys)alloys$(/l), as well as gunpowder, slag, rich slag, and charcoal. These can be automatically packed/unpacked with the $(l:thermal:technology/machines/press)multiservo press$(/l).

With storage blocks from other mods, Thermal follows a convention where the center item in the crafting recipe determines which mod's storage block to craft. For example, surrounding a Thermal copper ingot with 8 Immersive Engineering copper ingots will craft a Thermal copper block.
